ModMetaData.name: Expanded Simple FX Smoke Patch
ModMetaData.author: Botaxalim
ModMetaData.description: This Patch is for Simple FX: Smoke by Owlchemist Complete Vanilla Expanded Series with a graphical mod which adds smoke particle emitters to various buildings, such as the campfire, stoves and generator. Adding Compability with : DLC Royalty Vanilla Brewing Expanded - Coffees and Teas Vanilla Cooking Expanded Vanilla Cooking Expanded - Stews Vanilla Furniture Expanded Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Power Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Production Vanilla Factions Expanded - Settlers Vanilla Factions Expanded - Vikings
